value.stringValue: Please provide below information for the account your owned account is duplicated against. Please ensure the below fields are current and not blank.
Please provide below information for the account your owned account has an associated hierarchy with. Please ensure the below fields are current and not blank.

decisions.name: Is_Account_Already_Marked_as_Unworkable
decisions.label: Is Account Already Marked as Unworkable ?

rules.name: If_Submission_Reason_is_Review_Hierarchy
rules.label: If Submission Reason is Review Hierarchy

recordLookups.name: Get_Submission_Reason_Record_from_MDT
recordLookups.label: Get Submission Reason Record from MDT

recordUpdates.name: Update_Account_With_No_Owner_Change
recordUpdates.label: Update Account With No Owner Change

recordUpdates.name: Update_Overwrite_Validation_Rule_to_false
recordUpdates.label: Update Overwrite Validation Rule to false

fields.name: AccessDeniedMessage
fields.fieldText: You don't have sufficient access to mark the account as unworkable.

fields.name: UnworkableAccount
fields.fieldText: This Account is already marked as Unworkable.

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
An error occurred while updating the account: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}


Please Note: If the Submission Reason includes 'Out of Segment,' verify the Updated Account Size Segment is ENT, MM, or CML, or the Account Owner's role contains SLED or ADR.

fields.name: Screen2_Submission_Reason_Display
fields.fieldText: ï»¿Selected Submission Reason: {!Submission_Reason}

fields.name: VehiclesAssets_Proof_Error
fields.fieldText: Please submit one of the submission proofs to move forward.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please submit one of the submission proofs to move forward.
validationRule.formulaExpression: IF( {!Submission_Reason} = "Out of Segment: Vehicles/Assets", OR( NOT(ISBLANK({!VehiclesAssets_Gong_Call_Link})), NOT(ISBLANK({!VehiclesAssets_Gong_Engage_Task_Link})), NOT(ISBLANK({!VehiclesAssets_Other_Proof})), NOT(ISBLANK({!VehiclesAssets_FMCSA_URL})) ), true)

fields.name: VehiclesAssets_Gong_Engage_Task_Link
fields.fieldText: Link to Gong Engage email task

fields.name: SuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: Account has been successfully submitted. You can follow up with the next steps on this Case Number : {!Get_Newly_Created_Case.CaseNumber}.
